description: Portuguese Noah, inherited and embodies the Pleasure of Noah. Often referred to as the youngest despite his age, he possesses two distinct halves, one of which employs itself as a travelling coal miner in the company of a small group of humans he calls friends. Is somehow related to Rhode Camelot and Sheryl(Ceril) Camelot, as she calls him `Uncle` and Sheryl has addressed him as `Little Brother`
name: Tyki Mikk
